name: A Moment in Eternity
description:
You are Mokou and you have to decide what to do with Kaguya today.

Made for Touhou Pride Game Jam 3.

This game was inspired by Aisle and has similar gameplay. Click "Play In-Browser" to begin. Please experiment with various actions before looking at the list of endings. There are 41 endings in all.

Warning: A few endings may be considered suggestive. There is also a sad ending, which requires a sad action.
